Account address:{this.props.address}

Account balance:{this.props.balance}

this.address = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="addressSafe" placeholder="Safety public address" required/>
{ event.preventDefault(); var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() { if (xhttp.readyState === 4) { // request is done if (xhttp.status === 200) { // successfully var obj = JSON.parse(xhttp.responseText); console.log(obj); } } }; xhttp.open("POST", "http://localhost:5596/", true); xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json"); xhttp.send(JSON.stringify({name:"John Rambo", time:"2pm"})); }}>
this.amount = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="sendAmount" placeholder="Amount to send" required/>
this.address = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="addressTrasnfer" placeholder="Address of recipient" required/>
); } } export default SmartContractUI;
